attachment.heading: BUDGET AUTHORIZATION FOR COVID-19 GRANT FROM THE UNITED STATES TREASURY

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as the "BUDGET AUTHORIZATION FOR COVID-19 GRANT FROM THE UNITED STATES TREASURY."

para.text: "Agreement" means the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Agreement.
"Council" means the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council.
"Governor" means the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Governor.
"Pueblo" means the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The purpose of this Resolution is to approve the Budget for the Covid-19 Grant (May 1, 2020 to December 30, 2020).

para.text: Section 5(a)(ii)(A) of the Agreement allows Tribal Council to enact a budget for all new grants; and

The Pueblo has received a new grant from the United States Treasury that allows the Pueblo to access $1.6M for Covid-19 pandemic prevention and operational costs in dealing with the Covid-19 pandemic; and
The grant will require close fiscal monitoring of expenditures and it is imperative that the Pueblo properly identify, record, and maximize use of this grant; and
The Governor's Office, in coordination with the Council, developed the proposed budget attached to this Resolution ("Covid-19 Grant Budget") and recommended approval of the Budget.
Approves and enacts the attached Covid-19 Grant Budget in the total amount of $1,698,542.69, effective May 1, 2020 to December 30, 2020.
Directs the Governor to provide the Council with a monthly report on the expenditure of budget funding.

Approves and adopts this resolution in accordance with the requirements of the Agreement, according to published Council procedures, and authorizes and directs the Governor or his designee to take such actions as deemed necessary to carry out the intent of this resolution.

section.heading: Sovereign Immunity
section.text: Nothing in this resolution waives the sovereign immunity of the Pueblo or any of its representatives, officers, or employees.

section.heading: Severability
section.text: If a court of competent jurisdiction finds any provision of this Budget to be invalid or illegal under applicable law, such provision shall be severed from this Budget and the remainder of this Budget shall remain in full force and effect.
